about_the_game:
A first person shooter adventure game that combines the essence of Roguelike with high-speed battles, leading you on a journey of hero rise and cyborg revival.

Shuttle through the ever-changing dynamic world, every departure is an exploration of the unknown. Collect rare equipment and parts along the way, strengthen your arsenal, and prepare for sudden powerful boss battles.

Unlock hero characters - each hero has exclusive skills and tactical styles - control intelligent drones, or transform into Shadow Assassins to silently take the enemy's head.

Equipment System - Make every combination the key to overcoming challenges. From classic firearms to future technological weapons such as high-energy laser cannons and electromagnetic pulse launchers, build your ultimate combat configuration.

Random levels - infinite possibilities. By integrating advanced algorithms with preset and random elements, we create uniquely styled and challenging levels, providing each game with a brand new adventure experience.

Extreme Operations - Dance between speed and life and death, showcasing your ultimate skills. Quickly dodge the enemy's fierce attack, use terrain and tactical wisdom to defeat them one by one. Even if you accidentally fall, you can quickly recover at the base and embark on the journey again.

Collect cards - unlock permanent upgrades. Not only does it enhance your personal strength, but it also allows your every raid to penetrate deeper into enemy territory.

Optimize the gaming experience - enjoy a silky smooth operation feel. The high responsiveness input system combined with underlying performance optimization ensures that every battle can proceed smoothly, allowing you to immerse yourself in the ultimate shooting pleasure.

The original soundtrack music is full of passion and injects infinite power into this battle for survival in the future world. The perfect fusion of high-energy melodies and intense game rhythms brings you an unprecedented auditory feast.

The story is set in the distant year 2400, where humans struggle to survive in the barren desert and the flames of civilization are on the brink of collapse. Until a young girl unexpectedly awakens a sleeping cyborg in the ruins of an ancient campsite, the light of hope shines once again. They embarked on a journey hand in hand, crossing perilous canyons in search of opportunities for human rejuvenation. However, the obstruction of evil robots and unknown creatures has filled this path with unknowns and challenges... Now is the time to pick up weapons, fight alongside the girl and her guardians, and challenge the darkness for the future of humanity!

name: Cyborg: Rise Demo
short_description: An adventure game that combines first person shooter and Roguelite random elements. Players can manipulate heroes with different abilities in the game. Embark on adventure challenges in random levels. Every time you respawn, you can unlock new skills and equipment to challenge stronger enemies.
supported_languages: English, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
